name: 王紳
objective:
此課程涵蓋整個靜電磁學，其教學內容依序為
向量分析、真空中的靜電學、物質中的靜電學、靜電學微/積分方程式、穩態電流、真空中的靜磁學與物質中的靜磁學。
schedule:
Week	Date	 Topics
1	99/09/13	 Vector Analysis
2	99/09/20	 Vector Analysis
3	99/09/27	 Vector Analysis
4	99/10/04	 Electrostatics in Free Space
5	99/10/11	 Electrostatics in Free Space
6	99/10/18	 Electrostatics in Materials
7	99/10/25	 Electrostatics in Materials
8	99/11/01	 Electrostatics in Materials
9	99/11/08	 Midterm Exam
10	99/11/15	 Solution to Electrostatics
11	99/11/22	 Solution to Electrostatics
12	99/11/29	 Steady-State Current
13	99/12/06	 Steady-State Current
14	99/12/13	 Magnetostatics in Free Space
15	99/12/20	 Magnetostatics in Free Space
16	99/12/27	 Magnetostatics in Materials
17	100/01/03 Magnetostatics in Materials
18	100/01/10	 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Grading Policy

2. N. N. Rao “Elements of Engineering Electromagnetics” 6th Ed. 2004
